member.name: IMFTimedTextNotify.Cue
member.summary: Called when a cue event occurs in a text track.
member.param: A value specifying the type of event that has occurred.
The current time when the cue event occurred.

member.name: IMFTimedTextNotify.Error
member.summary: Called when an error occurs in a text track.
member.param: An MF_TIMED_TEXT_ERROR_CODE representing the last error.
The extended error code for the last error.
The identifier of the track on which the error occurred.

member.name: IMFTimedTextNotify.TrackAdded
member.summary: Called when a text track is added
member.param: The identifier of the track that was added.

member.name: IMFTimedTextNotify.TrackRemoved
member.summary: Called when a text track is removed.
member.param: The identifier of the track that was removed.

member.name: IMFTimedTextNotify.TrackSelected
member.summary: Called when a track is selected or deselected.
member.param: The identifier of the track that was selected or deselected.
TRUE if the track was selected. FALSE if the track was deselected.

member.name: IMFTimedTextNotify
member.summary: Interface that defines callbacks for Microsoft Media Foundation Timed Text notifications.
